mapper.select: SELECT G.g_seq ,G.g_title ,G.g_cont ,CASE WHEN to_char(G.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD')=to_char(sysdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN to_char(G.reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE to_char(G.reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') end reg_dt ,G.totalCnt ,G.rnum AS no FROM( SELECT gal.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY reg_dt) as rnum ,COUNT(*) OVER () AS totalCnt FROM gallog gal WHERE user_id = #{search_word} AND g_cate = #{search_div} )G WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1 ) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallog ( g_seq, user_id, g_id, g_pw, g_title, g_cont, g_cate, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{gSeq}, #{userId}, #{gId}, #{gPw}, #{gTitle}, #{gCont}, #{gCate}, sysdate, #{modId}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT g_seq ,g_title ,g_cont FROM gallog WHERE g_seq = #{gSeq}
